name: Both parties applied for a CO / FO [JOINT SOLICITOR]
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant 1: ((applicant name))
Applicant 2: ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((date of issue))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

Both parties in this joint ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application have confirmed the application for a ((isConditionalOrder??conditional))((isFinalOrder??final)) order. 

You will receive another notification when the application has been reviewed. 

View the latest status and documents: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Both parties have applied for a ((isConditionalOrder??conditional))((isFinalOrder??final)) order: ((reference number))
